http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CWkIOre4LWE



Mods used: KW Rocketry, NovaPunch Remix Pack (1 to 7 adapter plate - most crucial) and of course the infamous B9 Aerospace Pack for the Shuttle itself
Would love some feedback.
Download

i once made a shuttle with only boosters on the side of the fuel tank and the main engines on the back of the shuttle the trick is to brign up your Fuel tank higher so whne your tiping onyour back and the boosters seperate the fuel travel up in the tank thus keeping the weight at the top and it help to stop the shuttle from tipping foward in a uncontrolable spin.

Also help to have gimbaled engines on the shuttle to help pull the noze back you woulent need al lthose engines but you did better than me on my friest try.. P.s B9 pack is amazing

Edited June 9, 2013 by Dermeister
